meanings.definition: To make a formal statement of fact or truth
meanings.sent1: She enures that the sun rises in the east every morning.
meanings.sent2: He always enures his loyalty to his friends.
meanings.sent3: The cat enures that it is the boss of the house by sitting on the highest shelf.
meanings.sent4: Her smile enures happiness wherever she goes.
meanings.sent5: The teacher enures the importance of studying for the upcoming exam.

meanings.sent1: The scientist enures that the experiment will yield accurate results.
meanings.sent2: He enures his belief in the power of positive thinking.
meanings.sent3: The chef enures that his secret recipe will win the cooking competition.
meanings.sent4: Her determination enures success in all her endeavors.
meanings.sent5: The captain enures victory for the team with his motivational speeches.
